text:
@elonmusk I understood, you're want to live at Mars in 2nd half 2020. Well, you're doing good choice, because at Mars no #COVID19 . But in the same time, at Mars no water, no air, no food. What's vibes are better?
Moreover, you must not to leave Earth till ending of #quarantine.
